casebody.data:
In re Kenneth M.* (14122)

O’Connell, Spear and Hennessy, Js.

Argued May 24 decision released June 27, 1995 Glen G. Baron, for the appellant (petitioner). Denise Bevza, for the appellant (respondent). Barbara Claire, for the minor child.

In accordance with the spirit and intent of General Statutes § 46b-142 (b) and Practice Book § 4166B.2, the names of the parties involved in this appeal are not disclosed. The records and papers of this case shall be open for inspection only to persons having a proper interest therein and upon order of the Appellate Court.

 Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
